str2: Where, whither, in what place. From hos and pou; what(-ever) where, i.e. At whichever spot.
From diatithemai; properly, a disposition, i.e. a contract.
From ana and the base of agkale; constraint; by implication, distress.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I appoint, make (of a covenant), (b) I make (a will). Middle voice from dia and tithemi; to put apart, i.e. dispose.
